topics.author: 31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
It's a little late for me to say this, but I've been having a lot of interest in Dead Space lately. Probably it's because I've been marathoning all of Markiplier's Let's Plays of the Dead Space Trilogy. As of now, I'm on Part 13 of his Let's Play of Dead Space 3.

And now I am convinced that Isaac Clarke is the most badass engineer in space. _Marker-induced dementia?_ Trips out every now and then. _Necromorphs?_ Dismember them, kill them all, and call it a day. _Unitologists?_ Screw those guys, they ruin everything.

I'd love to marathon the games, but I really don't have the time or resources to do so. That, and I'd have to deal with all of the messed-up stuff that goes into those games, and I may or may not have a good time playing them myself...

~-Like having to fight off and kill freaking necromorph children and babies...dear god that's really horrifying-~
~-I'll take on everything else in those games over that-~

topics.body:
Uhm guys, I have a very important question.
If you aren't the most beautiful person ever, are you still allowed to
have an opinion on other's looks or do you just date whoever you get?

I don't want to be demanding, but there are people not even I can date...
topics.author: 5012e49c7f123b4012000341
31bee2686368722a0df23600

topics.body:
"@ArcticEight":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55158b5b6368723dacf70800#post_55158b5b6368723dacf70800
You choose your standards, if you choose to not want to have a romantic relationship with someone then that's your choice, so long as you are open honest and polite about it, then it's cool.

topics.body:
"@igotnopicks":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/551507876368725a022c0f00#post_551507876368725a022c0f00
[bq="igotnopicks"]"@trashboat":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5514fab363687259d0990400#post_5514fab363687259d0990400
If you want a character that can be a threat to him in almost every single way it would be Kirby.

Yes Kirby can break an entire Planet with his Nubs(He doesn't have Fists).
Yes Kirby can suck enemies and copy their abilities.
Imagine One Man Punch getting Sucked by Kirby and Kirby copying his ability of ending things with one PUNCH. (OH GOD)


Anyways I'm off to bed.[/bq]
I guess that's true.

topics.body:
You know what I would like to see in a superhero franchise?  A hero that has no super powers, tech or money and the villain have no powers either and the reason why they're arch enemies is that the hero's family was saved by a superhero and the villain's family was killed by the supervillain that the superhero accidentally crushed the villain's family a super fight in that same fight.  The hero sees the good heroes can do cause his family was saved, but the villain sees the destruction they do cause by saving the hero's family the superhero doomed his family.

Basically like if the superhero chose to save the other person's family then the hero would be the villain instead and the villain would be the hero.
